txt.en: '[placeholder], I for one have one more task for you. I fear that the Khundolar are preparing to mount a great invasion of the Horse-lords' lands, as they assaulted Calenardhon many long years ago.\n\n'You should warn the Horse-lords of their coming. Perhaps they will have time to prepare for the storm....'
'This is terrible news, [placeholder]! With the brigands already returning, to have Easterlings also building their strength against us, I do not know how we shall survive.'
'You should warn your friends among the Rohirrim of their impending doom....'
Amal is concerned that the Rohirrim do not yet know their plight.
Talk to Aculf at his camp in the Rushgore
Aculf is at his camp in the Rushgore, west of the Woodman camp.\n\nYou should bring Amal's warning to Aculf.
